spec_data.Name: perl-Catalyst-Plugin-Authentication
spec_data.Description:
The authentication plugin provides generic user support for Catalyst apps.
It is the basis for both authentication (checking the user is who they
claim to be), and authorization (allowing the user to do what the system
authorizes them to do).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:30:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Infrastructure plugin for the Catalyst authentication framework
